name: Drag The Office
description:
Entry for the Malaga Jam Weekend 13 (site of the Global Game Jam 2022)

Office worker by day... and Drag Queen by night! Help Jose Mari keep his stress at bay both in his office and on the dance floor.

Rythm game made in less of 48 hours as a entry for the Malaga Jam Weekend 13.

Instructions

  • Working in the office will rise the stress by second no matter what...
  • Missing the notes will rise your stress bar
  • BUT, hitting notes correctly in drag will lower the stress bar!

Team

  • Art - Jesús Porras
  • Programming - Ignacio Aparicio
  • Game Design - Fran Gambero
  • Music - Nogaleh
